200.description: List of comments for the entity
Dicts of entities and comments counts by family and category id

parameters.name: referrer
parameters.description: The referrer URL to register the visit

declustering_speed.description: Declustering speed (most of the time between 1.5 and 2, defaults to 1.65)

minimal_cluster_size.description: Minimal entity count for forming a cluster

zoom.description: Zoom level of the map (from 2 to 20)

display_name.description: The display name is used to show the field in the UI

display_weight.description: The weight of the field in the display (when displayed, ordered by weight)

field_type_metadata.description:
Used to store detail about the field that relevent
only for the frontend. For instance, if the field is an enum
use it to store possible values. If it is a SingleLineText, specify
if it's an email, a phone number, etc...

form_page.description: Form page number for the given field

form_weight.description: The weight of the field in the form (when displayed, ordered by weight)

help.description: The help text is used to show additional information about the field in the UI

indexed.description: Sets if the field is indexed (used in full text search)

key.description: The key is used to identify the field in the data object

mandatory.description: Sets if the field is mandatory

user_facing.description: Sets if the field is displayed to the final user

SafeModeConfig.description:
Safe mode configuration, when enabled, the application will require hcaptcha validation for
almost every action making it harder to spam the application or dump the database content
